heading: HR02185
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS (DPWH) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION (DOTr) TO NOTIFY AND REGULARLY APPRISE METRO MANILA DISTRICT REPRESENTATIVES ON ANY PROPOSED/ONGOING MAJOR/FLAGSHIP GOVERNMENT INFRASTRUCTURE DEVELOPMENTS IN THEIR RESPECTIVE CONGRESSIONAL DISTRICTS
